contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} {{Infobox Single | Name = Yokan | Cover = Yokan1.jpg | Cover size = 125 | Artist = [[Dir En Grey]] | from Album = [[Gauze (album)|Gauze]] | Released = July 14, 1999 | Recorded = [[Extasy Records#Extasy Recording Studios|One on One Recording North]] (L.A.) | Genre = [[Alternative rock]] | Length = 10:02 | Label = [[East West Records|East West]] <small>(AMDM-6300)</small><br />[[Warner Music Group|Warner]] | Producer = [[Yoshiki (musician)|Yoshiki]] | Chart position = | Last single = "[[Cage (song)|Cage]]"<br />(1999) | This single = "Yokan"<br />(1999) | Next single = "[[Myaku]]"<br />(2000) | Misc = }} {{Nihongo|"'''Yokan'''"|予感}} is a single released by [[Dir En Grey]] on July 14, 1999. The second track is a remixed version of their previous single, "[[Cage (song)|Cage]]". It was used as the drama [[Woman Doctor]]'s ending theme song. It is also the band's most popular song out of their old style, along with Cage. ==Track listing== {{Tracklist | all_lyrics = [[Kyo (musician)|Kyo]] | music_credits = yes | title1 = Yokan | note1 = {{Nihongo2|予感}} | music1 = [[Die (musician)|Die]] | length1 = 4:41 | title2 = Cage (＊Mix) | note2 = remix by [[Chris Vrenna]] | music2 = [[Kaoru (musician)|Kaoru]] | length2 = 5:21 }} == Personnel == * Dir En Grey ** [[Kyo (musician)|Kyo]] – [[singing|vocals]], [[lyricist]] ** [[Kaoru (musician)|Kaoru]] – [[guitar]] ** [[Die (musician)|Die]] – [[guitar]] ** [[Toshiya (musician)|Toshiya]] – [[bass guitar]] ** [[Shinya (musician)|Shinya]] – [[Drum kit|drums]] * [[Yoshiki Hayashi]] – [[music producer|producer]] * Eric Westfall - [[sound recording|recording]] * Yuji Sugiyama - [[Audio mixing (recorded music)|mixing]] * Bill Kennedy - [[Audio mixing (recorded music)|mixing]] * [[Chris Vrenna]] - [[remixing]], [[music producer|additional production]] {{Dir En Grey}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Yokan (Song)}} [[Category:1999 singles]] [[Category:Dir En Grey songs]] [[Category:Songs written by Kyo (musician)]] [[Category:Japanese television drama theme songs]]
